00008 void led_set_fwd(unsigned char level) {
00009         //Turn off all leds
00010         PORTE &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT0);
00011         PORTB = 0x00;
00012         PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT9);      
00013         PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT10);
00014         PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT11);
00015         PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT12);
00016         PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT13);
00017         PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT14);
00018         
00019         if (level > 0)
00020                 PORTE |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT0);
00021         if (level > 1)
00022                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT1);
00023         if (level > 2)
00024                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT2);
00025         if (level > 3)
00026                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT3);
00027         if (level > 4)
00028                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT4);
00029         if (level > 5)
00030                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT5);
00031         if (level > 6)
00032                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT6);
00033         if (level > 7)
00034                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT7);
00035         if (level > 8)
00036                 PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT8);
00037         if (level > 9)
00038                 PORTG |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT9);
00039         if (level > 10)
00040                 PORTG |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT10);
00041         if (level > 11)
00042                 PORTD |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT11);
00043         if (level > 12)
00044                 PORTD |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT12);
00045         if (level > 13)
00046                 PORTD |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT13);
00047         if (level > 14)
00048                 PORTG |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT14);      
00049 }
00050 
00051 void led_set_ref(unsigned char level) {
00052         //Turn off all leds
00053         PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT0);
00054         PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT1);
00055         PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT2);
00056         PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT3);
00057         PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT4);
00058         PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT5);
00059         PORTE &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT6);
00060         
00061         if (level > 0)
00062                 PORTG |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT0);
00063         if (level > 1)
00064                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT1);
00065         if (level > 2)
00066                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT2);
00067         if (level > 3)
00068                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT3);
00069         if (level > 4)
00070                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT4);
00071         if (level > 5)
00072                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT5);
00073         if (level > 6)
00074                 PORTE |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT6);       
00075 }

00077 void led_change_fwd_single(unsigned char level, enum enum_led_state state) {
00078         if (state == LED_STATE_ON) {
00079                 switch (level) {
00080                         case 1: PORTE |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT0);
00081                                 break;
00082                         case 2: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT1);
00083                                 break;
00084                         case 3: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT2);
00085                                 break;
00086                         case 4: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT3);
00087                                 break;
00088                         case 5: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT4);
00089                                 break;
00090                         case 6: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT5);
00091                                 break;
00092                         case 7: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT6);
00093                                 break;
00094                         case 8: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT7);
00095                                 break;
00096                         case 9: PORTB |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT8);
00097                                 break;
00098                         case 10: PORTG |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT9);
00099                                 break;
00100                         case 11: PORTG |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT10);
00101                                 break;
00102                         case 12: PORTD |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT11);
00103                                 break;
00104                         case 13: PORTD |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT12);
00105                                 break;
00106                         case 14: PORTD |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT13);
00107                                 break;
00108                         case 15: PORTG |= (1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT14);
00109                                 break;
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         else if (state == LED_STATE_OFF) {
00113                 switch (level) {
00114                         case 1: PORTE &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT0);
00115                                 break;
00116                         case 2: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT1);
00117                                 break;
00118                         case 3: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT2);
00119                                 break;
00120                         case 4: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT3);
00121                                 break;
00122                         case 5: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT4);
00123                                 break;
00124                         case 6: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT5);
00125                                 break;
00126                         case 7: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT6);
00127                                 break;
00128                         case 8: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT7);
00129                                 break;
00130                         case 9: PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT8);
00131                                 break;
00132                         case 10: PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT9);
00133                                 break;
00134                         case 11: PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT10);
00135                                 break;
00136                         case 12: PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT11);
00137                                 break;
00138                         case 13: PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT12);
00139                                 break;
00140                         case 14: PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT13);
00141                                 break;
00142                         case 15: PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_FWD_POWER_BIT14);
00143                                 break;
00144                 }
00145         }

00148 void led_change_ref_single(unsigned char level, enum enum_led_state state) {
00149         if (state == LED_STATE_ON) {
00150                 switch(level) {
00151                         case 1: PORTG |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT0);
00152                                 break;
00153                         case 2: PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT1);
00154                                 break;
00155                         case 3: PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT2);
00156                                 break;
00157                         case 4: PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT3);
00158                                 break;
00159                         case 5: PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT4);
00160                                 break;
00161                         case 6: PORTC |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT5);
00162                                 break;
00163                         case 7: PORTE |= (1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT6);
00164                                 break;
00165                 }
00166         }
00167         else if (state == LED_STATE_OFF) {
00168                 switch(level) {
00169                         case 1: PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT0);
00170                         break;
00171                         case 2: PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT1);
00172                         break;
00173                         case 3: PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT2);
00174                         break;
00175                         case 4: PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT3);
00176                         break;
00177                         case 5: PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT4);
00178                         break;
00179                         case 6: PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT5);
00180                         break;
00181                         case 7: PORTE &= ~(1<<LED_REF_POWER_BIT6);
00182                         break;
00183                 }
00184         }

00187 void led_set_vswr_state(enum enum_led_state state) {
00188         if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00189                 PORTG |= (1<<LED_VSWR_ALARM_BIT);
00190         else
00191                 PORTG &= ~(1<<LED_VSWR_ALARM_BIT);
00192 }
